modName: Turbo Craft AutoHotKey For Alchemy. Enchanting. Smithing Fast Leveling
summary: Use AutoHotKey program To decrease crafting time ( Alchemy, Enchanting, Smithing )
descriptionHtml:
Sorry for my bad English, but please read FAQ before give suggestion / request / ask / report bug

this tool / script / mod is replace manual spamming craft by your hand into computer auto script

enchanting vanilla  :
select weapon (press E) , select enchant tab (press D in SkyUI), select enchant effect (E),
select soul gem tab(D), select soul gem (E), craft(R), confirm (Y)

NOW craft in reverse order for efficiency
select soul gem (E), select enchant tab (A),select enchant effect (E),
select weapon tab (A), select weapon (press E), craft(R), confirm (Y)

in short version :
press E,D,E,D,E,R,Y then press E,A,E,A,E,R,Y,
if you want to craft 10 item, then you must do that instruction  5 times

if you use my tool / script / mod, you only need  :
press PGUP button to start
then press PGUP again to stop
the tool / script / mod will press the buttons for you

FAQ :
Q : What this tool / script / mod do? / not do?
A : -This tool / script / mod is replace manual craft by your hand into computer auto script
      -this mod do not edit any stat or anythings in skyrim

Q : Any software / files / version to run this tool?
A : -this tool require skyui ( Because left - right select menu on enchanting )
      -this tool require autohotkey

Q : what is autohotkey
Q : https://autohotkey.com/#keyfeatures

Q : how to install ?
A : 1.download installer from https://autohotkey.com/
     2. custom installation, select ANSI instead Unicode ( Because notepad default is ANSI )
     3. after installation finished open "test.ahk"  that me provide (there will be new green icon in tray)
     4. then press J from your keyboard
     5. if it worked, then it will open new message box
     6. if not worked, ask the google , i learn about this software this morning

Q: how to use :
A:  [ i assume the autohotkey is works ]
open "skyrim craft.ahk" that me provide (there will be new green icon in tray)
then open skyrim ( SKSE + SkyUI )

-Alchemy
select at least two ingredient (until "Remove"  and "craft" button available )
see the images "no.1"
then press "insert" key on your keyboard to start
then press "insert" key again on your keyboard to stop

-Enchanting
drop your un-enchantment armor or cloth, or other item that you maybe accidentally crafted
( like favorite or unique item or soul gems that to big or to small to craft),
for fastest leveling, use "banish" enchantment on weapons only,
(i assume you have at last some  un-enchantment weapon and soul gems to craft)
select weapon from top list
see the images "no.2"
-if you only learn only "banish" effect, press PGUP to start, then press PGUP again To stop
-if learn all vanilla enchanting effect  ( "banish" enchanting effect  is number 5 from top)  press PGDN to start, then press PGDN again To stop
take item that you before drop after leveling done

-smithing ( and cooking, and tanning, and smelting )
select / highlight the weapon / armor  / jewelry that you want to craft
see the images "no.3"
then press "delete" key on your keyboard to start
then press "delete" key again on your keyboard to stop

dont forget close the software if you done
thanks for reading
author: virginharvester
